maps

Class MainMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.MainMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level1, StartScreen

    public abstract class MainMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps are collections of the objects. Also, they have some useful methods to connect App and MainCanvas with objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      EndListener endListener
      It has reset method inside called when user misses the apple
      protected java.util.ArrayList<MainObject> objects
      List of objects.
      protected int points
      User gain points when hit the apple.

    • Field Detail

      • objects

        protected final java.util.ArrayList<MainObject> objects
        List of objects. The objects are drawn from 0 to end of the list

        User gain points when hit the apple.
